question:
If \(\frac{1}{2}f(x) = f(\frac{x}{2})\) , which of the following is true for all values of f(x)?
(A) \(f(x) = 2x + 2\)
(B) \(f(x) = 13x\)
(C) \(f(x) = x^2\)
(D) \(f(x) = x - 10\)
(E) \(f(x) =\sqrt{x-4}\)
